original_text: Another of the women was Joanna, the wife of Chuza. Chuza had authority over all the people that worked in the house of King Herod. Another of the women was Susanna. There were also many others. These women were using their own money to help Jesus and his disciples.
korean_text: 헤롯의 청지기 구사의 아내 요안나와 수산나와 다른 여러 여자가 함께 하여 자기들의 소유로 그들을 섬기더라

sentences.original_text: Another of the women was Joanna
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 여성 중 한 명은 요안나였습니다

sentences.original_text: Chuza had authority over all the people
that worked in the house of King Herod
Another of the women was Susanna
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 여성 중 한 명은 수산나였습니다
그 외에도 많은 다른 이들이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: These women were using their own money
to help Jesus and his disciples
